text:
Note: For this quiz, a country is defined as a sovereign state that is recognised by more than half of the 193 UN member states. ID: 10671299 A: Name a country that contains FOUR or more A's. Guess I give up! Madagascar Saudi Arabia Antigua and Barbuda Antigua & Barbuda Antigua + Barbuda Antigua Barbuda Madagascar, Saudi Arabia, and Antigua and Barbuda. B: Name a SIX-LETTER country that starts with a "B". Guess I give up! Brazil Belize Bhutan Brunei Brazil, Belize, Brunei, and Bhutan. C: Name a country that ENDS with a C. Guess I give up! Czech Republic Dominican Republic Central African Republic CAR Czech the Central African Republic the Dominican Republic the Czech Republic the car Czech Republic, Dominican Republic, and Central African Republic. D: Name a ONE-WORD country that BEGINS with a D. Guess I give up! Denmark Djibouti Dominica Denmark, Djibouti, and Dominica. E: Name a ONE-WORD country that contains THREE or more E's. Guess I give up! Greece Liechtenstein Seychelles Venezuela Venezuela, Greece, Liechtenstein, and Seychelles. F: Name the ONLY non-European country that begins with an F. Guess I give up! Fiji Fiji. G: Name a country in North, South, or Central America that BEGINS with a G. Guess I give up! Guatemala Grenada Guyana Guatamala Guatemala, Grenada, and Guyana. H: Name a country that BEGINS with H, other than Hungary. Guess I give up! Haiti Honduras Haiti and Honduras. (Holland is not the name of a country, in case youâ€™re wondering.)
I: Name a country that contains THREE or more I's. Guess I give up! Dominican Republic the Dominican Republic Kiribati Philippines The Philippines Saint Kitts and Nevis St Kitts and Nevis Saint Kitts & Nevis St Kitts & Nevis St. Kitts and Nevis St. Kitts & Nevis Saint Vincent and the Grenadines St Vincent and the Grenadines Saint Vincent & the Grenadines St Vincent & the Grenadines St. Vincent and the Grenadines St. Vincent & the Grenadines Dominican Republic, Kiribati, Philippines, Saint Kitts and Nevis, and Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. J: Name a country that contains a J, but DOESN'T begin with one. Guess I give up! Azerbaijan Djibouti Fiji Tajikistan Azerbaijan, Djibouti, Tajikistan, and Fiji. K: Name the ONLY country that ENDS with a K. Guess I give up! Denmark Denmark. L: Name a country that contains MORE THAN ONE L. Guess I give up! Central African Republic CAR El Salvador Marshall Islands The Marshall Islands Seychelles Solomon Islands the Solomon Islands Central African Republic, El Salvador, the Marshall Islands, Seychelles, and the Solomon Islands. M: Name a country that ENDS with an M. Guess I give up! United Kingdom UK The United Kingdom The UK Belgium Vietnam United Kingdom, Belgium, and Vietnam. N: Name a country that BEGINS with N, but ISN'T in Europe or Africa. Guess I give up! Nepal Nauru New Zealand Nicaragua North Korea Nepal, Nauru, North Korea, New Zealand, and Nicaragua. O: Name a ONE-WORD country that contains THREE O's. Guess I give up! Kosovo Morocco Comoros Kosovo, Morocco, and Comoros. P: Name a SIX-LETTER country that begins with P. Guess I give up! Panama Poland Poland and Panama. Q: Name a country that contains a Q, but DOESN'T begin with one. Guess I give up! Mozambique Iraq Equatorial Guinea Mozambique, Iraq, and Equatorial Guinea. R: Name a country that contains TWO consecutive R's. Guess I give up! Andorra Sierra Leone Andorra and Sierra Leone. S: Name an ASIAN country that begins with an S. Guess I give up! Sri Lanka Saudi Arabia Singapore South Korea Syria Singapore, Sri Lanka, Syria, South Korea and Saudi Arabia. T: Name a country that ENDS in T. Guess I give up! Egypt Kuwait Ivory Coast Egypt, Kuwait, and the Ivory Coast. (Tibet is not a sovereign state.)
U: Name the only country that contains THREE U's. Guess I give up! Uruguay Uruguay V: Name the only EUROPEAN country that BEGINS with a V. Guess I give up! Vatican City Vatican Vatican City. W: Name a EUROPEAN country that contains a W. Guess I give up! Norway Switzerland Sweden Norway, Sweden, and Switzerland. (Wales is not a sovereign state.)
X: Name a country that contains an X. Guess I give up! Luxembourg Mexico Luxembourg and Mexico. Y: Name the ONLY country that contains TWO Y's. Guess I give up! Kyrgyzstan Kyrgyzstan. Z: Name an AFRICAN country that contains a Z, but DOESN'T begin with one. Guess I give up! Mozambique Swaziland Tanzania Mozambique, Swaziland, and Tanzania. Can You Beat This Infuriating A To Z Geography Quiz? SHARE YOUR RESULTS ID: 10670703 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Robin Edds is editor-at-large at BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
